100 Days program Report

Progress Report

Maharashtra IT Program - 100 Days Initiative

The 100 Days Report outlines the current status and detailed progress of Maharashtra's 100-day IT program. Out of 23 key initiatives, 20 have been successfully completed, while 3 are still in progress.

20
Completed
87%
3
In Progress
13%
23
Total Initiatives
100%

Overall Program Progress

87% Complete

Key Achievements

Digital Infrastructure

Upgraded state-wide digital infrastructure with enhanced connectivity and security protocols across all government departments.

‚úì Completed

Citizen Services Portal

Launched comprehensive online portal providing 50+ government services with 24/7 accessibility for citizens.

‚úì Completed

Cybersecurity Framework

Implemented robust cybersecurity measures and trained 10,000+ government employees on digital security protocols.

‚úì Completed

Mobile Applications

Developed and deployed 15 mobile applications for various government services with user-friendly interfaces.

‚úì Completed

Data Management System

Centralized data management system with real-time analytics and reporting capabilities for better governance.

‚è≥ In Progress

Digital Literacy Program

Comprehensive training program reaching 50,000+ citizens across urban and rural areas of Maharashtra.

‚è≥ In Progress

Program Timeline

Day 1-30

Foundation Phase

Infrastructure assessment, team formation, and initial project planning completed successfully.

‚úì Completed
Day 31-60

Implementation Phase

Core system deployments, security implementations, and citizen service portal launch.

‚úì Completed
Day 61-90

Integration Phase

System integrations, mobile app deployments, and extensive testing across all platforms.

‚úì Completed
Day 91-100

Optimization Phase

Final optimizations, performance tuning, and comprehensive documentation in progress.

‚è≥ In Progress
